item.title: Ethereum Mining Coalition
item.description: Mining in the Desert # It Started in May of 2017 # As a member of a three-man startup that mined Ethereum and Bitcoin for four years, I have to say that it was a challenging and exciting experience. Our journey started with the realization that we could earn a significant amount of money through mining cryptocurrency. So, we decided to invest in building our own mining rigs. The makings of our first rig, named Atlas.

item.title: Meditation Buddy
item.description: Meditation Buddy # Summary # Meditation Buddy was my thesis for Tsinghua University. I was the creator of the project and saw it through from initial conception to launching and testing with 20 different participants to see the effectiveness of the app. Meditation Buddy is a meditation app that uses the smartphone camera to assess the user’s body position of the upper torso and head. Based on their body position for the last 6 seconds, an inference is made of whether or not they are meditating.

item.title: Skyrock Projects
item.description: Skyrock Projects # STEAM Projects for Students age 7-14 # After graduating from Tsinghua in October 2020, I was living in Taipei. I had been going to the hot yoga studio there frequently, and one time I was chatting with another person about how I just graduated and was looking for an engineering job. Someone else overheard our conversation, and it turns out they worked for a startup that was looking for engineers!

item.title: Accretive Technology Group
item.description: Leveling up Front-End Skills # Creating ads seen by millions # As a Front-End Web Developer at ATG, my main responsibility was to analyze industry trends and lead the implementation of CRO initiatives. During my time at the company, I had the opportunity to work on several exciting projects that contributed to the success of the business. Quick stats: ATG is a B2C streaming platform with over 2K white labels.

item.title: BatteREuse
item.description: BatteREuse # Summary # For the launch project as part of the GIX program, the GIX team partnered with UW-spinoff BattGenie to develop a use-case & market entry point for the nascent technology. The GIX team developed a prototype Energy Storage System (ESS) and Battery Management System (BMS) for Lithium-ion batteries. It included a customer-facing dashboard that went through two rounds of usability testing. This post is a rehash of our final report and final presentation.

item.title: Diablo 3 Strategy Guide
item.description: Diablo 3 Strategy Guide # About the Project # In the 7th grade, I discovered what it means to have a played a truly epic game. Diablo 2 came out at that time, and since I opened the package I was consumed in battling the minions of Hell. So when the opportunity came, over 10 years later, to help create a strategy guide for Diablo 3, you bet your buttons I jumped at the opportunity.

item.title: AllTreatment
item.description: A resource for those battling addiction # Startup Employee #1 # Working at AllTreatment.com was an exciting and educational experience. As an intern, my primary responsibility was to research and write SEO content to help the website rank higher on search engines. I learned a lot about search engine optimization and how to write content that is both engaging and informative. After I graduated, I was given the opportunity to become the first employee of the company.

item.title: Deepfake Detection
item.description: Kaggle Deepfake Competition # For one of the courses at Tsinghua we had the opportunity to take part in a Kaggle competition. We chose the Deepfake Detection. While we didn’t win first, we did get a pretty competitive model!

item.title: Undergrad
item.description: Undergraduate Projects # Undergraduate Research Symposium # Creating a Linguistic Gold Standard for Greek # I worked with the late iSchool professor, Efthimis Efthimiadis, to help parse the Greek language for use in Greek search engines. Me presenting at the Undergraduate Research Symposium. Look at that young Zach! It was my first real use case for python and learning firsthand how O(n) can impact your code. My initial code took waaay to long to run.

item.title: Consulting
item.description: Consulting History # Green Air Supply - Jan-Feb 2023 # Green Air Supply is a company that makes nitrogen separators. One of the founders wanted to have a GPT3 chatbot for the 2023 Beverage trade show. I made them a chatbot that would consider their documentation and previous customer interactions to answer any questions a new customer or operator might have about their products. You check out the Bev-Bot here.
